backend/main.mo: Main ICP actor defining all backend types (UserProfile, ProProfile, Booking, Service, etc.), state maps, and integrations including access control, blob storage, Stripe, and HTTP outcalls. Contains commented-out Payrexx and heartbeat payment release logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping three feature requirements to their target files: creating ProApp.tsx as a self-contained pro-space component, defining color constants with C.t4, and wiring ProApp into RoleSelectionV2.tsx.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document summarizing each frontend source file's purpose, covering components, context, hooks, utilities, and configuration files across the project.
frontend/index.css: Global CSS entry point importing Tailwind layers and defining shadcn CSS custom property tokens for light and dark themes including colors, radius, and sidebar variables.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point loading Inter font from Google Fonts, setting viewport-fit=cover for iOS, and mounting the React app via main.tsx into the root div.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component wrapping the app with QueryClientProvider, AuthContextProvider, and AppContextProvider, rendering ScreenRouter inside a centered 430px container with a --void background.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Empty legacy file, previously the V1 application entry point with no current content.
frontend/src/components/BookingContact.t: Booking contact form screen collecting name, phone, and address, with a simulated async confirmation flow that navigates back to the explorer on success.
frontend/src/components/BookingDate.tsx: Booking date and time selection screen with day pills and a time slot grid, navigating to the booking flow when a time is selected.
frontend/src/components/BookingFlow.tsx: A multi-step booking flow component (5 steps: service, location, date/time, client info, confirmation) that collects booking details and navigates to the live status screen upon confirmation.
A simple screen for selecting the service location (domicile or studio) with a continue button that navigates to the booking flow.
frontend/src/components/BottomNav.tsx: A bottom navigation bar component that renders role-aware tabs with SVG icons, highlights the active screen, and shows a pending bookings badge.
frontend/src/components/Builder.tsx: A 2-step profile builder form for professionals to enter their name, city, category, bio, and services, then creates a new pro profile and navigates to its fiche page.
frontend/src/components/BuilderPreviewMo: A full-screen modal that previews a professional's built profile, displaying cover photo, logo, name, badges, bio, and social media links.
A reusable step-progress indicator component that displays numbered steps with labels, marking completed steps with a checkmark and highlighting the current step.
frontend/src/components/BusinessScreen.t: Pro business management screen with sub-tabs for identity, payment, services, and gallery; handles photo uploads with a 3-photo minimum requirement to activate the profile.
Client-facing dashboard displaying pending and confirmed bookings with cancel functionality and a navigation prompt when no bookings exist.
frontend/src/components/Confetti.tsx: Renders an animated confetti overlay of 30 randomly positioned, colored, and timed falling particles using CSS keyframe animation.
frontend/src/components/CroppingModal.ts: A modal for interactively cropping an image via drag and zoom controls, supporting configurable aspect ratios and persisting crop parameters on save.
Pro dashboard showing greeting, stats, and an activation banner or active-profile status depending on whether the pro profile is activated.
frontend/src/components/Explorer.tsx: Explorer screen listing demo professionals with search and category filter controls, navigating to a pro's profile on selection.
frontend/src/components/ExplorerV2.tsx: A discovery screen component that displays beauty professionals with search, category filtering, and rotating subtitles. Renders flash-deal pros and a filtered pro list, navigating to a pro profile on click.
frontend/src/components/GalleryPhotoUplo: A gallery photo upload component that manages a grid of image slots with a minimum count, supporting adding/removing slots and delegating each upload to the ImageUploader component.
frontend/src/components/GlobalHeader.tsx: A sticky top header displaying the NEXUS logo, a notification bell with unread badge, and a user avatar initial, linking to the notification center.
frontend/src/components/icons/Icons.tsx: Library of reusable SVG icon components (Flash, Search, Check, X, Bell, Radar, Wallet, Dashboard, Business, Star, Lock, etc.) accepting size, color, and className props.
frontend/src/components/ImageUploader.ts: An image upload component supporting drag-and-drop or file input, with validation, optional localStorage compression, and automatic opening of a cropping modal after upload.
frontend/src/components/LandingPage.tsx: A minimal landing page displaying the NEXUS brand and a single 'Commencer' button that navigates to the splash screen.
frontend/src/components/LiveStatus.tsx: A live booking status screen showing an elapsed-time counter and a step-by-step timeline tracking the progress of an ongoing service appointment.
frontend/src/components/Login.tsx: A login screen with Internet Identity authentication and a demo fallback, both routing to the role selection screen after login.
frontend/src/components/MessagingSheet.t: A bottom-sheet messaging UI component that displays a conversation between a client and a pro, with auto-reply simulation and message sending functionality.
frontend/src/components/MonBusiness.tsx: A thin wrapper component that renders ProLayout for the 'Mon Business' section.
frontend/src/components/NexusOS.tsx: A thin wrapper component that renders ProLayout for the NexusOS section.
frontend/src/components/NotificationCent: Displays a list of user notifications with options to mark all as read or remove individual notifications, using AppContext for state management.
A 4-digit OTP verification screen that accepts code '1234' for demo purposes, then sets the app role to 'client' and navigates to the explorer screen.
frontend/src/components/OTPVerificationV: An updated OTP verification screen (V2) with paste support and loading/error states, navigating to 'explorerV2' on successful code entry.
frontend/src/components/PaymentForm.tsx: A credit card payment form with real-time validation for card number, expiry, and CVC fields, reporting validity and data to the parent via a callback prop.
frontend/src/components/ProApp.tsx: Self-contained Pro app root component managing global state (view, wallet, profile) with inline sub-components for Dashboard, Radar, Wallet, Business, Modal, Success, and a TabBar.
frontend/src/components/ProDashboard.tsx: Thin redirect component that immediately navigates to the 'nexusOS' view via AppContext on mount.
frontend/src/components/ProErrorBoundary: React class-based error boundary that catches runtime errors in the Pro section and displays a styled French-language error screen with a retry button.
frontend/src/components/ProFiche.tsx: Detail page for a selected professional, showing a cover image, name, rating, flash badge, and list of services with a selection state.
frontend/src/components/ProLayout.tsx: Layout shell for the Pro section that composes RadarPro, WalletPro, DashboardScreen, and BusinessScreen under a ProTabBar, with subscription modal and success overlay management.
frontend/src/components/ProLogin.tsx: Login screen for the Pro space that triggers Internet Identity authentication and redirects to 'nexusOS' on success.
frontend/src/components/ProOnboardingMod: Bottom-sheet modal presenting Pro subscription benefits, saving the user's professional role to the backend, then navigating to the profile builder.
frontend/src/components/ProProfile.tsx: Displays a detailed profile page for a selected professional, including a cover image, animated stats (rating, reviews), services list, and a back navigation button. Uses a custom count-up animation hook for numeric stats.
frontend/src/components/ProSubscriptionM: A full-screen modal for pro subscription sign-up, showing a 7-day free trial offer with a list of benefits and an email input. On submission, it simulates an async call, sets the pro as active with flash enabled, and navigates to the NexusOS screen.
frontend/src/components/ProTabBar.tsx: A bottom tab bar component for the pro interface with four tabs: Radar, Wallet, Dashboard, and Business. Highlights the active tab in gold and accepts an onChange callback.
frontend/src/components/ProviderDetail.t: Renders a provider detail page with a cover image, name, rating, stats grid, bio, and a selectable services list. Falls back to a default service if none are defined on the pro object.
frontend/src/components/RadarPro.tsx: A pro-side radar dashboard showing incoming booking requests with countdown timers, confirmed appointments, and history across three tabs. Supports accept/decline actions with a simulated SMS toast notification.
An interactive radius selector component that visually displays a growing circle proportional to the selected km value, controlled by a styled range slider up to 50 km.
frontend/src/components/RoleSelection.ts: A role selection screen for the NEXUS app where users choose between 'Client' and 'Professionnel' profiles, navigating to OTP verification or pro onboarding respectively.
An updated role selection screen with icon-enhanced cards and press animations, routing clients to OTP flow and pros directly to the ProApp component.
frontend/src/components/ScreenRouter.tsx: A lazy-loading screen router that maps currentScreen context values to the appropriate React component, with a spinner fallback during code-splitting loads.
frontend/src/components/ServicePhotoUplo: A photo upload manager for service listings supporting up to 5 images, with a required main photo slot, removable additional slots, and drag-handle indicators using the ImageUploader component.
frontend/src/components/SMSToast.tsx: An animated toast notification component that displays an SMS-sent confirmation with phone number and message, auto-dismissing after ~4 seconds. Includes a commented-out Twilio integration stub with security warnings against frontend credential exposure.
frontend/src/components/Splash.tsx: An animated splash/landing screen featuring ambient gradient orbs, the NEXUS logo, a tagline, and a connect button that navigates to role selection.
frontend/src/components/Subscription.tsx: Full-screen subscription page displaying a 7-day free trial offer with a list of benefits and CTA buttons to start the trial or go back to role selection.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionModa: Bottom-sheet modal presenting subscription benefits with a simulated 800ms activation delay before triggering the subscribe callback.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionScre: Subscription activation screen that sets subscription state, adds a notification, and navigates to the main OS view when the user starts the free trial.
frontend/src/components/SubscriptionSucc: Animated success screen shown after subscription activation, progressing through a loading phase with a progress bar then a confetti success state before calling onComplete.
frontend/src/components/SupportChat.tsx: Floating chat widget with a keyword-based auto-response system, quick-action buttons, and a typing indicator for simulated support interactions.
frontend/src/components/UpgradeModal.tsx: Modal dialog prompting users to upgrade to a Pro account, listing key benefits and calling upgradeToProAccount from context on confirmation.
frontend/src/components/WalletPro.tsx: React component displaying a pro user's wallet with balance, weekly bar chart, transaction history, and a transfer-to-IBAN button that triggers a 30-second cooldown and SMS toast notification.
frontend/src/components/Welcome.tsx: Onboarding screen that prompts the user to enter their first name, sets the app role to 'client', and navigates to the explorer screen.
frontend/src/context/AppContext.tsx: Central React context providing global app state including navigation history, user role, selected pro, booking data, notifications, wallet, SMS toast, and subscription status.
frontend/src/context/AuthContext.tsx: Authentication context wrapping the Internet Identity hook to expose isAuthenticated, principal, login, logout, and loading state to the app.
frontend/src/context/ProContext.tsx: React context for pro-specific state including profile data, active status, and wallet transfer cooldown timer.
frontend/src/data/mockData.ts: Re-exports demo pro types and data from demoData utils, and defines static mock objects for wallet transactions and radar booking requests.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an authenticated or anonymous ICP backend actor using React Query, reinitializing and invalidating dependent queries when the identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useGeolocation.ts: Custom hook that requests the browser's geolocation, stores coordinates in sessionStorage, and exposes coordinates, loading, error state, and a requestPermission callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useImageUpload.ts: Custom React hook that handles image file uploads via drag-and-drop or file input, validating format (JPG/PNG/WebP) and size (max 5MB), then converting the file to base64 and invoking a callback.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Custom React hook and context provider for Internet Computer Internet Identity authentication, managing login/logout state, identity persistence, and delegation validity checks using the DFINITY AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, pro profiles, location-based filtering, and booking CRUD operations (create, read, update status).
frontend/src/index.css: Global CSS file defining design tokens (CSS variables for colors, typography, spacing), base resets, app layout constraints, and a set of keyframe animations used throughout the UI.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrapping the root App component.
frontend/src/types/cropping.ts: TypeScript type definitions for image cropping parameters (scale, offsets, dimensions) and a combined ImageData interface holding base64 data alongside optional crop params.
frontend/src/utils/cityData.ts: Utility module providing Swiss Romande city lists, approximate inter-city distances, and helper functions to compute proximity categories and filter cities within a given radius.
frontend/src/utils/confetti.ts: Utility function that programmatically creates a canvas overlay and animates golden confetti particles falling across the screen for 3 seconds, then removes the canvas.
frontend/src/utils/demoData.ts: Defines TypeScript interfaces and mock data for demo professionals (barbers, hairdressers, aestheticians, etc.) including their services with prices, durations, badges, and images.
frontend/src/utils/haversine.ts: Exports a `calculateDistance` function that computes the distance in kilometers between two GPS coordinates using the Haversine formula, rounded to one decimal place.
frontend/src/utils/imageCompression.ts: Provides utilities for measuring localStorage usage, compressing base64 images via canvas to JPEG, and calculating the byte size of a base64 string.
frontend/src/utils/nominatim.ts: Geocodes a city name to coordinates using the Nominatim API with localStorage caching, and provides a Haversine distance helper function.
frontend/src/utils/servicePresets.ts: Defines preset service lists (name, price, duration, badges) for categories Barber, Coiffure, Esth√©tique, and Massage, along with their TypeScript types.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading URL parameters from both query strings and hash-based routing, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning sensitive params from the URL bar.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration for the NEXUS app, defining a dark-themed custom color palette, NEXUS-specific border radii, box shadows, and a rich set of custom animations and keyframes.
project_state.json: Tracks the project's architectural decisions, existing features, known issues, and new feature requests for the NEXUS pro-space React app, serving as a build-planning state document.
